name: Desert templates pack
description:
Original VCMI default templates with desert scenery.

To play these templates, you need to enable the following mods:
1. Horn of the Abyss/Wasteland terrain submod (by Hota Crew, ported by VCMI Team)
2. Pavilion Town/Dunes terrain submod (by edeksumo, lillith)
author: luk3Z
